Manchester.Elliot Hospital:
Elliot Hospital, founded in 1890, is one of two hospitals in Manchester, New Hampshire, United States. The hospital has 296 beds and is a trauma center (Level 2) for the city and the surrounding community.
Other facilities in the Elliot Health System include the Elliot at River's Edge, which provides urgent care and doctor's offices and opened in 2010 on Queen City Avenue in Manchester.
